title: 200 TPD waste, 30 TPD cow dung to fuel new CBG plant in Dadumajra
full_text: 200 TPD waste, 30 TPD cow dung to fuel new CBG plant in Dadumajra. The land earmarking ceremony for the project was held on Monday, marking a major step towards scientific waste management and renewable energy generation in the city.. Chandigarh is set to generate clean energy from waste as the upcoming Compressed Biogas (CBG) plant at Dadumajra will process 200 tonnes per day of segregated organic municipal solid waste and 30 ton… [+2217 chars]
